meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a bat.
meanings.sent1: The dark, chiropteran wings of the creature fluttered silently in the night.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the chiropteran features of the bat species.
meanings.sent3: The chiropteran costume at the Halloween party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her chiropteran-like ability to navigate in the dark amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The cave was filled with the eerie echoes of chiropteran calls.

meanings.sent1: The chiropteran swooped down gracefully to catch its prey.
meanings.sent2: In the evening, chiropterans can be seen flying across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The chiropteran in the attic startled the family when it flew out unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The chiropteran's silhouette against the moon looked like a mysterious shadow dancer.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as they watched the chiropteran flit around the garden at dusk.
